alert.note: Alert for Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 3:25PM AKST until February 02 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island including Angoon. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of light freezing rain is possible before a transition to rain late Wednesday afternoon. Confidence is lower regarding the timing of the transition to rain. A later or earlier transition time may greatly impact snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island
